title: Musk Deletes Post and Apologizes, Says Comments "Went Too Far"
summary: Elon Musk deleted his June 5 post about Trump being in the Epstein files and apologized on June 11, saying his comments "went too far." However, he would return to the attack after the DOJ's July 7 memo.

sources.title: Musk apologizes for Epstein-Trump claim, deletes viral post

notes: The apology was temporary as Musk resumed attacks in July.
